comments:
Hi, 
following instructions on this link: 
http://help.eclipse.org/help31/index.jsp?topic=/org.eclipse.hyades.test.doc.user/tasks/texecuting-the-test-execution-service.htm
I did not sucseed to start test execution using ant task. I recieve this error message each time. I test this in 2 separated machines using internal ant into eclipse and commandline ant execution - result is always the same:
Buildfile: D:\eclipse31\workspace\DemoTestContainer\test.xml
test:
java.io.IOException: CreateProcess: .\eclipse -nosplash -application org.eclipse.hyades.execution.server -vmargs -Dtptp.automation.command=execute -Dtptp.automation.synchronicity=synchronous -Dtptp.automation.data="C:\Temp\memento47648.dat" error=2
at java.lang.ProcessImpl.create(Native Method)
at java.lang.ProcessImpl.<init>(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ProcessImpl.start(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ProcessBuilder.start(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source)
at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.client.strategies.OutOfProcessStrategy.execute(OutOfProcessStrategy.java:110)
at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.client.ServiceProxy.execute(ServiceProxy.java:77)
at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.client.AutomationClient$Default.execute(AutomationClient.java:160)
at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.client.adapters.java.AutomationClientAdapter.execute(AutomationClientAdapter.java:105)
at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.client.adapters.ant.AutomationClientAdapter$Automation.execute(AutomationClientAdapter.java:172)
at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.client.adapters.ant.AutomationClientAdapter$Test.execute(AutomationClientAdapter.java:444)
at org.apache.tools.ant.UnknownElement.execute(UnknownElement.java:275)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.perform(Task.java:364)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:341)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.performTasks(Target.java:369)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeSortedTargets(Project.java:1216)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTarget(Project.java:1185)
at org.apache.tools.ant.helper.DefaultExecutor.executeTargets(DefaultExecutor.java:40)
at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.antsupport.EclipseDefaultExecutor.executeTargets(EclipseDefaultExecutor.java:32)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTargets(Project.java:1068)
at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.antsupport.InternalAntRunner.run(InternalAntRunner.java:423)
at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.antsupport.InternalAntRunner.main(InternalAntRunner.java:137)
BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 375 milliseconds

Do you have any idea why ant task for execution is not working?
Do I need to upgrade to TPTP 4.2 to have this functionallity?

Regards

This error most likely indicates that you have not correctly specified the eclipse.home property in your ant script.  There are several values in that example ant script which must be changed, as described in the instructions you linked.

"The test project is located in the specified workspace of "d:\development\workspace" and the Eclipse host instance is specified to be "d:\development\eclipse".  Refer to the reference list of supported properties for other valid combinations of properties."

Assuming those properties are not valid for your installation, you must modify the script accordingly.  If you still find problems, feel free to re-open the defect with more information.
